title: Decision Tree Classification with Scikit-Learn
description: In this lab, we will learn how to use Decision Trees for classification using scikit-learn. Decision Trees are a non-parametric supervised learning method used for classification and regression. They are simple to understand and interpret, and can handle both numerical and categorical data.

meta.title: Decision Tree Classification with Scikit-Learn
meta.description: Learn how to use Decision Trees for classification with Scikit-Learn. Explore this powerful machine learning technique and its applications.
meta.keywords: machine learning, decision tree, classification, scikit learn, scikit-learn, data analysis, scikit-learn playground
